column3:
“At a Grateful Dead show at Deer Creek Amphitheatre, ‘joebrand’ (aka ‘wonkanobe’) and ‘pbud’ met ‘chemdog’ and sold him an ounce of very high quality pot for $500. joe and chemdog exchanged numbers and they later arranged for two ounces to be shipped to chemdog on the east coast. According to chemdog, one ounce was seedless and the other had 13 seeds.

In ’91, chemdog popped the first 4 seeds. From these seeds, one ...”

“I'm not entirely sure what the hell I was babbling about in my last long winded review of Chem 4, but that's proof of its psychoactive semi psychedelic strength , I can always tell if I'm smoking fuego cause i tend to be under the false assumption that being overly descriptive in pseudo poetic fashion will gain a Leafly reviewer fanbase that rivals One Direction, and flower child groupies will throw themselves at my ...”

“My first opportunity to try this T 26.4% flower (x PCK) and I'm very glad that I did! Definitely pungent earthy uptake, but calming, resiny exhale heals any wounds-of-the-day.. Cerebral|psychotropic strain, for sure, and prob NOT best-suited for beginners. But for us-ol'timers? A definite 5✨ staple!”

“Beware if you are a newbie!!!! I'm a newbie, smoked everyday back in the 70's, but havn't since 78 or so. This weed gave me an extremely euphoric, laugh my ass of high, but at a cost. I am prone to panic attacks, reason I quit smoking in 78. But, I have had sooo many panic attacks, I can usually deal with them, as I did with the Purple Kush High induced anxiety. I don't like body buzzing or any kind of vibration feel...”
“you don't need to smoke a lot haha it hits you like a brick then fucks you in the sky”
“Fantastic! strong, heavy Indica hit. pinched nerve pain killer. RELAXED.”

“I have a pretty high tolerance, i had been taking Percocets and Sour Diesel or Bubba Kush after extensive back surgery the week prior to trying this strain.  The evening I tried it I took my usual Percocet after an hour of tossing, moaning, and grinding my teeth in bed from sheer pain and not being able to sleep., 1 hr later the pain was reduced but still significant, I'm allowed to take 1-2 Percocets  and instead of...”

“🌲⛽️ Chemdawg 4 is where science has taken us. Hybrids are getting more mind-blowing by the year and this is a prime example. For being indica dominant, this strain sure produces a wonderful cerebral effect. It tastes very lemony and has a fresh, sort of chemical smell. After the initial head rush, a very sedative body high sets in and will keep your eyes from staying all the way open. This is not a strain for beginn...”

“Swoops in and takes hold providing an intense couch-lock. Able to concentrate better on tasks at hand while not moving. I can sense all locations of soreness and if I think hard enough am able to release them with mind tricks.”

“I’ll begin with this; watch out. This strain is one hell of a punch. I’ve been smoking for quite a while now, and this strain has been giving me quite a fight. I love it. The scent is a nice lemon, citrus, and earthy, couldn’t be a better scent for my grinder. Both alone and with friends, this bud can put anybody on their ass, no doubt. It’s such a relaxing strain to take pain or anger off of anyone’s mind. Being an ...”
“When I think back on the times in my life where I thought wow I'm really really high" those times are.....everyday xD

column1: just this chem is made of magical creatures in my head! it's like the stars have made a red rover line in the front and back of my head
column2: with all kinds of leg tingles going in vibrating streams from the edges of my hips to the tips of my lips.

column1: if you ever have the chance to scoop some of this bea...”"

column3: “This strain is an overall GREAT weed for anytime of the day- HIGHLY RECOMMEND!! For more experienced smokers, this strain actually gets you high.”
“I was laughing my ass off!  Felt clear headed but apparently I was very high!  Great for depression!”

“completely out of hand, in the best way.  only 22% thc, but from one of my two favorite growers, this is one to smoke if you wanna be non-functional and just have a blast.  stop over-thinking things...  really stop thinking at all... have a few chuckles with friends and enjoy the full-body buzz.”
“Chem4 from KOMA is on another fucking level! I mean next level shit!”
“too ME this is MY NO.1 Choice...Chemdawg4 will tear you up. COUCHLOCK FOR SURE”

“This strain is not for a beginner or one who gets lifted easily by a few hits on a bowl. It packs a punch and it hit me in two solid steps: One, automatic, medium effect when you hit it and let the fumes linger in your lungs. That first step hits you after the first hits you do, then the second effect was harsher for me. That kept me laying on my bed, writing this review... I am so comfortable, my knee pain is comple...”

“A couple hits of this and i feel like im on a cloud but I can still function and speak clear but long sentences. A lot of creative juices will flow in you so have so pen and paper or a guitar to let it flow. Will couch-lock you but takes time. Burn one up people !”

“Not too sure how baked I am, but I guess that means pretty baked. Definitely feel clear headed, but kinda like I’m floating at the same time. Great taste. I’m 99% sure I’m super baked, so great stuff.”

“An intense cerebral high and then felt throughout the body. Good for chronic pain and some far out dreams during sleep. Chemical smell with a deep pungent aroma of earthiness and lemon, tastes about the same too. Original Chem is one of my favorite so it was interesting to smoke an indica variety- can't beat diesel.”
“I was in a motorcycle accident and have permanent nerve damage and this strain takes the pain away for a while.”
“This has a great onset. everythings chill. yes it does hit ya in the first 5 ms. harder. good pain killer (herniated disk, sciatica.) just awesome.”

“A unique strain with a unique high, the buds have a tendency to turn out to be fat and round like broccoli. A true hybrid, it's immediate effect is a sativa head high, followed by a powerful indica stone. Immediate pain repression throughout the entire body. Better pain relief than norco or vicodin and comes on faster.”

“I like that this is a heavy indica. It really has been helping my back pain. I do not have the actual strain, but the concentrate of it. I wish the oil was more potent, I noticed it takes multiple dabs in order to feel the effects. Its decent though. Has a slightly weird aftertaste, but it could have been the way it was produced.”

“•🔥-alert! • this thc-30.68% Theraplant 💣-bud is crossed with Pakistani Chitral Kush for other-🌎ly 💨experiences! —> PC4K? • high terpenoid profile makes for a 🍋&🌲y-delight! • Beginners beware! Eurphoric, smooth blasts erase all of day's stress + anxiety, as i ready (& steady! -be sure you're sitting down ⚡️🌪) my welcome, indica couch-lock! • 
• 5-☄️🔥•”

“Location: L'Eagle Services 
THC: 19.37 - 23.14%
CBD: N/A

Additional Notes:  I did not love this one at first, but it really grew on me. 

Appearance Rating: 5.00
Appearance Description: The buds seem to be chunky for the most part. They are relatively compact without being too dense. They're an olive green with light orange pink hairs. They are exceptionally frosty and as always with L'Eagle, very well manicured. 

...”

“Wow this strain is fire! I had 2 precious seeds, my cat got to 1 of them and I was left with 1 un known sex seed. well I was extremely lucky for this seed was a female! I grew her until the end and OMG what a joy it was. The taste is on point. It's also probably 1 of the strongest and best tastes that I've grown to date. That first hit off that bone, bong, whatever u prefer is just out of this world. I almost fell of...”

“• Testing at thc-30.68%, this beauty-bud is crossed with Pakistani Chitral Kush, so both chem & kush qualities SHINE in this not-for-newbies' strain.. • Head to toe 🔥-euphoria that literally resembles a whip-it • true indica, so great 👌🏻 for evenings.. altho its' calming, cerebral effects perfectly balance-out my ADHD-brain, so also great daytime strain (for me) for creativity & focus. Highly recommend • 🍀”

“The smell of this strain hits you as soon as you open the bag/jar, its a very distinct strain at that so you know what it is your getting upon smelling & smoking it. The taste is like a good Pinsol & chemicals . The chemical notes stay lingering in your mouth. The nugs also look like they've been sprayed in sparkle dust. There light green and very dense to the touch, small to medium sized nugs. It was just a tad dry ...”

“This strain has a smell that will have you thinking twice about buying it.  However once you light it, it has a very appealing taste.  Mixed with Banana Kush, it will wash almost all your pain away.”

“I got an eighth of this stuff from a good buddy of mine that works at a local dispensary.
I kind of underestimated it.
Loaded a bowl, and took an incredibly fat rip.
It went straight to my chest, and made my eyelids heavier than anvils.
A nice, mellow stone. I highly recommend it if you have work in the morning, and can't sleep. No stress, not much paranoia. Just relaxation and gnarly munchies.

I mixed this an...”

“A unique strain with a unique high, the buds have a tendency to turn out to be fat and round like broccoli. A true hybrid, it's immediate effect is a sativa head high, followed by a powerful indica stone. Immediate pain repression throughout the entire body. Better pain relief than norco or vicodin and comes on faster.”

“The smell of this strain hits you as soon as you open the bag/jar, its a very distinct strain at that so you know what it is your getting upon smelling & smoking it. The taste is like a good Pinsol & chemicals . The chemical notes stay lingering in your mouth. The nugs also look like they've been sprayed in sparkle dust. There light green and very dense to the touch, small to medium sized nugs. It was just a tad dry ...”

“Location: L'Eagle Services 
THC: 19.37 - 23.14%
CBD: N/A

Additional Notes:  I did not love this one at first, but it really grew on me. 

Appearance Rating: 5.00
Appearance Description: The buds seem to be chunky for the most part. They are relatively compact without being too dense. They're an olive green with light orange pink hairs. They are exceptionally frosty and as always with L'Eagle, very well manicured. 

...”

“Concerned my Percocet prescription was going to lead down a dark road I tried to see if weed would help my headaches. I went to Mass Alt care in Chicopee Mass and bought some an 8th of Chem. 1 toke from the one hitter & the pain melted away. After about 45 minutes of euphoria a heavy & deep drowsiness let me get one of the best sleeps I had in weeks. I hope they keep this in stock.”
“Chemdawg 4 is outstanding. The batch I got had a very skunky smell (thick aroma), and helped all the symptoms I have.”

“Got this on special only knowing that it was supposed to be a heavy hitter and good for relaxing. Smell is earthy and foresty with hints of citrus/lemon. Almost smells like it could be a cologne. The buds were super dense with a mixture of light greens, dark greens, and burnt oranges. Taste was sweet, almost like a rich unsweetened chocolate or maybe a very mild coffee. Sweet in an earthy way. The smoke was thick and...”

“Really good. Makes my body feel so good and I was even having minor dreamlike visuals where things looked like beautiful illustrations or paintings. Being outside in the sunshine was euphoric. No racing thoughts. Excellent for increasing libido and physical enjoyment.”

“Woke up with an exhausting migraine. Nothing but intense, gripping pain. Picked up some Chemdawg 4 and, within 1-2 hours, it was completely gone. I haven’t found a single strain that could accomplish this same result without residual, lingering symptoms. Chemdawg 4 fulfilled my desperate need for the perfect migraine killer. All hail the unicorn strain of migraine freedom!”

“From Phoenix Relief Center in AZ. Ammonia, lemon, skunks, no off flavors at all. The kind I got was top of the plant top shelf. Holy moly this is an extreme Sativa. Love this strain, a new favorite. Very good anytime smoke. Will make you want to go out. I usually don't go for sativas, but when I smelled this flower, i jumped and smiled because I found the flower I couldn't leave with out. Smells like the best!! Smooo...”

“The smell is mild and almost like puppy's breath.  This strain is very potent and left me feeling very happy, euphoric and lazy.  This is definitely one of those strains you instantly feel familiar and happy with once the effects start kicking in.  9 out of 10.”

“Woke up with an exhausting migraine. Nothing but intense, gripping pain. Picked up some Chemdawg 4 and, within 1-2 hours, it was completely gone. I haven’t found a single strain that could accomplish this same result without residual, lingering symptoms. Chemdawg 4 fulfilled my desperate need for the perfect migraine killer. All hail the unicorn strain of migraine freedom!”

“Holy live resin gods! Wow this is super strong, not for first timers unless you wanna be lit :) amazing quick super heavy head high. Followed shortly by a mastery of the body and relaxation beyond belief. Took a bit too big of a dab and wow am I loaded! First dab of the day oh wait maybe my second... super relaxing great for watching stuff and chilling a little heavy for outside activities unless not very athletic ha...”

“Really good. Makes my body feel so good and I was even having minor dreamlike visuals where things looked like beautiful illustrations or paintings. Being outside in the sunshine was euphoric. No racing thoughts. Excellent for increasing libido and physical enjoyment.”
“Amazing flower. Hits very smoothly, and the flavor is excellent. Relief is but a hit away. I have a very high tolerance, and a lot of pain to relieve. This is a magical, wonderful friend.”
“Chemdawg 4 is outstanding. The batch I got had a very skunky smell (thick aroma), and helped all the symptoms I have.”

“This is my first strain review, inspired by realizing that vaping this flower has not only lifted the early-midlife-crisis anxiety swirl of I've wasted so much of my life! what have I even accomplished? What does it all meeeeeean?" that had started to plague me
column4: but is also giving me positive creative energy. It's made me think about the various projects I have in the air with renewed excitement

column3: “Excellent weed ! Couldn't stop laughing lol. My cheeks were in pain from laughing and had to smoke more for the pain !”

“Pretty potent, and anyone with a high tolerance will feel this one. Starts with a cerebral head effect, then a full body buzz that will slowly get you relaxing with a heavy body feel, and a bit couch locky. Felt very stoney as I spaced out sometimes on this, but still had a clear head. Would recommend evening use, and I wouldn't do anything important on this. Just sit, and chill is all you should be doing after smoki...”

“Really good. Makes my body feel so good and I was even having minor dreamlike visuals where things looked like beautiful illustrations or paintings. Being outside in the sunshine was euphoric. No racing thoughts. Excellent for increasing libido and physical enjoyment.”
“Just be ready for the couch. This strain is rather sour to the taste and provides an intense cerebral high.”

“This was recommended to me by my daughter . When I was finally able to finally secure some I found it quite rewarding. This is another sneaky one. When lit it hits your throat like warm butter and that encourages you to take as much in as possible. While the smoke is still in you will start to feel it work. Energizes you and mutes your pain rather quickly. Lovely stuff!! Want another oz please!!”
“Excellent weed ! Couldn't stop laughing lol. My cheeks were in pain from laughing and had to smoke more for the pain !”
“definitely a good night-time smoke. Very dense bud structure with diesely notes with undertones of citrus. best smoked for its flavor”
“Calm super chill high that will let you take a nap if you want or do some cleaning if you need to.”
“Amazing flower. Hits very smoothly, and the flavor is excellent. Relief is but a hit away. I have a very high tolerance, and a lot of pain to relieve. This is a magical, wonderful friend.”

“Just what the doctor ordered. Beautiful pull-n-Snap shatter, very tasty and stony too. Terpy, with great citrus flavor and smell. It's liking taking a chill pill, super relaxing and mood elevating. The perfect after work smoke-able cocktail.”

“Woke up with an exhausting migraine. Nothing but intense, gripping pain. Picked up some Chemdawg 4 and, within 1-2 hours, it was completely gone. I haven’t found a single strain that could accomplish this same result without residual, lingering symptoms. Chemdawg 4 fulfilled my desperate need for the perfect migraine killer. All hail the unicorn strain of migraine freedom!”

“Potent strain from The Green Room.
Smell and taste stings with a very organic, bitter citrus overtone with undertones of cleaning chemicals.
The high gives me a smack-faced feeling at first and keeps me active. Definitely felt my heart rate go up with this one. A bit too much of an upper without the clear-mind effect that I look for but it is fun for sure. 
Went through 1/8 this time.”
“Amazing flower. Hits very smoothly, and the flavor is excellent. Relief is but a hit away. I have a very high tolerance, and a lot of pain to relieve. This is a magical, wonderful friend.”

“Holy live resin gods! Wow this is super strong, not for first timers unless you wanna be lit :) amazing quick super heavy head high. Followed shortly by a mastery of the body and relaxation beyond belief. Took a bit too big of a dab and wow am I loaded! First dab of the day oh wait maybe my second... super relaxing great for watching stuff and chilling a little heavy for outside activities unless not very athletic ha...”
“This is in my top 3 favorite strains just because there is imo of course no better sleep medicine. Knocks me out cold every time.👍🏼👍🏼👍🏼👍🏼😍😍😍😍”

“Terribly strong, but achieve nice, waves of body high. Not a great choice if you need to do stuff or be active; definitely a couch-locker! Need to try having one hit instead of 2 or 3 to see if that produces a more enjoyable, less overpowering buzz.”
“Higher than a hippie in a helicopter thanks to this strain and AZ Natural Selections. Come check these guys out and receive a free gram for being a first-time patient!”

“The smell is captivating and strong. Wow. That of a Chemical & or diesel type scent. Hence the name Chemdog. The colors pop on her and make for a pretty lime & forest green colored Plant. The nugs are small to medium size.  The potency is there, just not off the charts. But most importantly, it works well for me. ChemDawg#4 helps with depression/PTSD/Anxiety &appetite. I would definitely try this strain again.  Peace...”
“Pure relaxation with an exquisite after taste. Also seemed a bit psychedelic with some of the thoughts that come to mind. Great for getting a good nights sleep or even working out.”
“I love this strain! It's amazing high and strong chillin head High. When you open the jar of Chem Dawg 4 it's strong fire! 😎🔥👍🏻👍🏻”

“Good Strain if you get the right CD4
I medicate Heavily and not for sleep and it did the job, Personally I thought  it was lacking in Flavor.
Flowers are tight and very shiny almost as a crystal.
Not bad, more neutral.”

“Chemdawg #4 is one special strain, it's listed as a indica dominant hybrid but it hits me like a sativa dominant one. Go figure. It's a stress reliever for me, I have a lot of anxiety and usually the stress builds up physically in my neck and once Chem 4 sets in the stress is gone. Both mentally and physically. I do notice a slight decline in focus and motor function but not a couch-lock type deal. It's smell is a du...”

“Terribly strong, but achieve nice, waves of body high. Not a great choice if you need to do stuff or be active; definitely a couch-locker! Need to try having one hit instead of 2 or 3 to see if that produces a more enjoyable, less overpowering buzz.”

“I think this is a great indica strain. I have it crossed with PCK(a heavy indica) & its 27.5 THC. This is one of the BEST indica strains I’ve ever had. It relieves stress, anxiety, insomnia. Just what I was looking for!! A little pricy at $48 1/8th but its worth it. I take Klonopin for anxiety but it is not needed with this strain!! Don’t smoke it first thing in the AM unless you want to be super couch locked.”
“Higher than a hippie in a helicopter thanks to this strain and AZ Natural Selections. Come check these guys out and receive a free gram for being a first-time patient!”
“Been searching, and searching, for the one. And I think I found it. I'm literally floating, I don't walk I glide. Got a fresh batch by matrix, buds were one of the freshest I've seen. 10 stars.”

“I have had the original chem dawg in San Diego and man this is definitely a strain that targets all the levels of what it is needed for. Paranoid yes a little. But! Relaxing cerebral tones to it for sure. Highly rec chem dawg 4 !”
“Heavy couch lock indica-dominant  hybrid with >20% THC, good for insomnia and anxiety.”

“Ooooooookay. Just slowing down from warp speed to the speed of a man vaping some chemdawg #4 outside in his man shed so that I can review this stuff. It’s good! 😜. Suuuuper feeling vape making you feel like the whole world is absolutely still for a moment. But also your head is going faster then warp speed. Perhaps into flannel or beyond kinda speeds. When you listen with your ears for the first time. That’s how goo...”
“I love this strain! It's amazing high and strong chillin head High. When you open the jar of Chem Dawg 4 it's strong fire! 😎🔥👍🏻👍🏻”
“top shelf strain, crazy high thc numbers.  This is what medical weed should be.”

“Terribly strong, but achieve nice, waves of body high. Not a great choice if you need to do stuff or be active; definitely a couch-locker! Need to try having one hit instead of 2 or 3 to see if that produces a more enjoyable, less overpowering buzz.”

“this Chem is like no other this place has the best med hands down”
“Good stuff! Very social strain. Just wondering if this is the same as Chem 4 that we got at Cannabis Nation in Seaside, OR, grown by Phoenix Rising Farms?”

“I have been smoking for a little over a year and until I tried this strain I had never found one that I could call my favorite. I do caution the newbies with this one. It is strong and has the capacity to get you uncomfortably high. The strain relieved my knee pain quite well and delivered a great balance of cerebral effects and couch-lock heaviness. Perfect for a lazy weekend Netflix marathon.”

“I have had the original chem dawg in San Diego and man this is definitely a strain that targets all the levels of what it is needed for. Paranoid yes a little. But! Relaxing cerebral tones to it for sure. Highly rec chem dawg 4 !”

“This strain is so nice. The high comes on quick, pain and stress disappeared!”

“Terribly strong, but achieve nice, waves of body high. Not a great choice if you need to do stuff or be active; definitely a couch-locker! Need to try having one hit instead of 2 or 3 to see if that produces a more enjoyable, less overpowering buzz.”

“Another great terpenes profile. Added with the knock out thc it's a winner of more than just chicken dinner. This plant is a great hybrid defiantly indica dominate the taste says all. Worked excellent for anxiety due to PTSD”
“I was the T-Rex of the pot dinosaurs and I was fending off  all the other pot -loving dinosaurs away from my stash. Pretty damn good.”

“THIS IS AS OG AS IT GETS. listed as an Indica although with a power packed puch of a Sativa. i been useing this for various medical related issues but also recreationally as its just that much fun and strong. long body high very uplifted as well.”
“Love it. Very strong and it helps with my pain.”
“loved it! Smells good tastes good, felt it in 3 minutes. It calmed me, no anxiety here! Only bad thing it was a Lil harsh to me.”

“I have been smoking for a little over a year and until I tried this strain I had never found one that I could call my favorite. I do caution the newbies with this one. It is strong and has the capacity to get you uncomfortably high. The strain relieved my knee pain quite well and delivered a great balance of cerebral effects and couch-lock heaviness. Perfect for a lazy weekend Netflix marathon.”

“Not like other chem blends. Hot to the nose and burned throat. Did I get a bad batch? The high weighed the body down with a 'buzzy skin' feeling. Also getting 🔨'd with a headache each time I smoked. This chem just didn't go with my chem.”
“This strain is amazing I get migraines a lot when I feel one coming just take a few hits and I'm off in lala land for a few hours but then hunger strikes me”
“Good stuff! Very social strain. Just wondering if this is the same as Chem 4 that we got at Cannabis Nation in Seaside, OR, grown by Phoenix Rising Farms?”

“Stay away if you suffer from depression.   I've had depression and anxiety issues my whole life. Since I got my medical marijuana card, I've probably tried over 20 strains. Every single time I smoke chemdawg 4, I get really blue and usually end up crying. lol That has never happened to me before and I've been getting stoned since I was 19. (I'm 41) Plus, it did nothing for pain. Just made me sad and sleepy. Never aga...”
“This is in my top 3 favorite strains just because there is imo of course no better sleep medicine. Knocks me out cold every time.👍🏼👍🏼👍🏼👍🏼😍😍😍😍”

(I'm 41) Plus, it did nothing for pain. Just made me sad and sleepy. Never aga...”
“I love this strain! It's amazing high and strong chillin head High. When you open the jar of Chem Dawg 4 it's strong fire! 😎🔥👍🏻👍🏻”
“grow it with love so I can roll it us with love and smoke with love ♡”

“Tried this strain out in Colorado. The chem part of the name is accurate, this smells strongly of pine and diesel mashed together. Like someone was trying to mop up a diesel spill with pinesol. 

Initially, it was really pleasant. Nice head high and we were all super giggly. However, as the night went on, it started to have more of a psychedelic effect and I was having disturbing thoughts and flashbacks. Another pers...”
“Laid Back, not too heady-high. Body high is powerful and calming. Very helpful for my anxiety and blood pressure. A good strain to smoke and make music or be creative with.”

“Probably my favorite strain of all time, very pungent buds with nice trich's to it. What makes it even better is that it has more of the body buzz kick a little more but keeps that really heady high. If I could smoke on one strain for the rest of my life it would be this.”
“This has become my before bed strain. With it being 80% indica, it hits me fast and hard. Great for sleep, gives a serious case of the munchies, and makes me feel very sleepy within an hour.”
“This is my favorite aid to falling asleep. Two or three hits and I can't keep my eyes open. It's a great pain reliever, also.”
“Its nice with some beer very relaxing”
“Available in CT. A great way to end a day :)”
“extremely powerful bud”

“Take Chemdawg, make it indica dom., the grab the tastiest pheno of that lot, lastly up the potency but loose some of the diesel smell.

For me being a indica guy it's like a suped up version of Chemdawg where the piney taste puckers ur taste buds n just hits the spot.”
“You can never beat a classic! This is a great indica dominate hybrid. Great for lounging around helps relive stress and great for that sleepy time punch before bed.”

“Take Chemdawg, make it indica dom., the grab the tastiest pheno of that lot, lastly up the potency but loose some of the diesel smell.

For me being a indica guy it's like a suped up version of Chemdawg where the piney taste puckers ur taste buds n just hits the spot.”

“Chem 4 shatter w/ Mr Welton CBD lifted my head up cleared the fog and destroyed lower back pain in morning while be able to get shiptz done and function during the day and lasted for 3 hr's w/ Cbd on deck on Hashishans Lo Drop's 5mg @ night need for medicine becomes less and less.
Chem nice and tasty lemon light lemon after taste.”
“You can never beat a classic! This is a great indica dominate hybrid. Great for lounging around helps relive stress and great for that sleepy time punch before bed.”
“This strand was pleasant and enjoyable.”

“Great strain for a hybrid.  Definitely has the Indica traits of relaxing,  and  fantastic stress relief.   Great for anxiety,  not my favorite for insomnia but it will work in high quantity if you need to.   Very good with relieving  lower back pain.  Not very pretty looking,  really small buds but this particular Bach had 28% thc so I can over look the asthetics.”

“I found some wax I had bought from my dispensary a long time ago and I don’t know why I hadn’t used it all before. Starts hitting me in the eyes after 5-10 minutes, heavy eyelids, and then a nice relaxing feeling slowly takes your body. Great for sleeping! Munchies don’t hit much if you have a good meal before.”
“This strand was pleasant and easily enjoyable!”
“Chem 4 - amazing scent, smooth and buzzy”

“Chem 4 shatter w/ Mr Welton CBD lifted my head up cleared the fog and destroyed lower back pain in morning while be able to get shiptz done and function during the day and lasted for 3 hr's w/ Cbd on deck on Hashishans Lo Drop's 5mg @ night need for medicine becomes less and less.
Chem nice and tasty lemon light lemon after taste.”

“Thus stuff is amazing. I can actually take it in the ass like Justin Timberlake. Not that soft Nsync stuff....but some unlubricated sandy solo
 action.”
“Tried a concentrate of this strain.. Relaxing, really strong head high. Great for afternoon unwinding after a long day”

“Tastes like lemon pledge or pine sol, BUT...This high was an interesting one. It kinda buzzes your head almost for a few minutes intensely, then she drops gently down your spine sinking all the way into your feet. I felt like I was almost being scanned by something and relieved as it washed over my body.”

“I found some wax I had bought from my dispensary a long time ago and I don’t know why I hadn’t used it all before. Starts hitting me in the eyes after 5-10 minutes, heavy eyelids, and then a nice relaxing feeling slowly takes your body. Great for sleeping! Munchies don’t hit much if you have a good meal before.”

“Just picked this strain up from a club, it tested in at over 27% which is ridiculous. They said its the strongest they have ever had at their dispensary. 

The high is very powerful i smoked about half a bowl and just laid back day dreaming for awhile. 

Excellent strain overall. The smell may put some people off but this is a fantastic strain”
“hit one bowl of this and i'm retarde baked. very nice tasting”

“One of my favorite strains. Chemdawg 4 is strong but not over powering. I do not feel overly energetic yet I feel capable of doing whatever I want, no couch lock. It is very similar to blue dream and a definite go to for creative thinking.”
“good relaxing, stress free strain, feels like a big hug.”

“It is really nice. Only for me i can't regularly smoke this. It's a little too speedy, and i get kind of retarded high too.it has a good raunchy smell and taste to it too. not bad raunchy. more like when you buy an expensive square of chevre from Whole Foods raunchy.”
“Fire!!!!! ☆★☆★☆ So pungent,! Densely trichomed out! Tasted soooo smooth and got me sooooo backed!”
“The bombay!”

“I am a huge GDP fan and when my dispensary was all out I bought an 1/8 of this. The flowers were fluorescent green and hevily frosted. The bud has a pungent smell that is aromatic but strangely coffe like. (maybe just me). The bud is definitely tasty and smooth to smoke and worthy of your best glass piece. I got mine at White Mountain in Sun city AZ. Try it.”

“Tried this strain out in Colorado. The chem part of the name is accurate, this smells strongly of pine and diesel mashed together. Like someone was trying to mop up a diesel spill with pinesol. 

Initially, it was really pleasant. Nice head high and we were all super giggly. However, as the night went on, it started to have more of a psychedelic effect and I was having disturbing thoughts and flashbacks. Another pers...”
“Excellent flavor profile, clean and sweet smoke, full yet light and tasty. Very nice daytime or night”
“I grabbed an 1/8 the other day from ACS was blown away, always heard of it but finally get to try it.. so good I went back the next day to get another eigth.”
“One of the best of the year for me. Very fuely,sticky as hell and very reminiscent of GG#5 in terms of a high. I would choose this fist though.”
“Strong Potent Weed. Real good cerebral buzz that relaxes you into a slump. Smell is equally as strong as potency!”
“Tingly feeling on your forehead. Relaxing warm not too tiered.”

“It is easily one of the best strains I have ever smoked. This includes all the weed I smoked in Amsterdam. I prefer Indica to Sativa any old day of the week, and this is definitely for Indica lovers. Severe couch-lock, murderous munchies, but very uplifted and euphoric. Chemdawg 4 just puts you in a good and lazy space.”
“Laid Back, not too heady-high. Body high is powerful and calming. Very helpful for my anxiety and blood pressure. A good strain to smoke and make music or be creative with.”
“This is my favorite aid to falling asleep. Two or three hits and I can't keep my eyes open. It's a great pain reliever, also.”

“Grown by the famous Koma, this strain left me tired, relaxed and euphoric. The bag appeal is amazing, this BHO is rhe color you look for with the clarity you can only dream of. The taste on this Gentlemen Extracts BHO is mild and magnificent. The pine is probably the strongest note to my pallet”
“I hope you are hungry!! Awesome high, no pain and super stony but lock that fridge up, I couldn't stop eating :) Love the Chem!!!”
“Very fruity smell and taste.”
“2 puffs and your high! For being an indica dominant I still felt like doing stuff. Super intense head high, made feel feel super giggly. Also great taste and smell.”
“This is by far my favorite ever! Thanks az natural selections I love your place, your people (esp puck) I will be back!”

“As a person who doesn't really smoke sativa's at all, i truly enjoy the head high" from the flower. The flavor is perfect and the overall sensation i feel upon ingestion is beyond words. In love to say the least.. How ever always remember
column4: Its not the strain its the farmer”"

column3:
“This is a very pungent strain -
First hit was a choking fit -
Immediate high -
Scratchy throat after exhale -
Almost leathery -
Slight piney flavor -
A right behind the eyes high -
Def a head high -
Very euphoric and relaxing”
“A really nice hybrid! I just tried it as a extract, and really like it. I get a nice positive head high & it is super relaxing.  Smells kinda like Pine-Sol, but in the vest way. I will get again.”

“Great strain for a hybrid.  Definitely has the Indica traits of relaxing,  and  fantastic stress relief.   Great for anxiety,  not my favorite for insomnia but it will work in high quantity if you need to.   Very good with relieving  lower back pain.  Not very pretty looking,  really small buds but this particular Bach had 28% thc so I can over look the asthetics.”
“Available in CT. A great way to end a day :)”
“I wrote the review below before I signed up :-)”
“I get so mellow from C4 that I go to sleep!”
“best for my chronic pain!”
“Very imaginative and visual, but puts me in a weird place. I like it, but its different than most strains so far.”
“Do urself a favor....try it”
“Such a lovely smoke ❤ My new favorite”

“For those that never got to try the real cut of Chem-D, this is the closest you will get to the perfection known as the D.

I don't get the Nag Champa Smell that you would associate with Star Dawg, or Chem-D, but what you do get is a flower that all others should be measured.  

Very few strains possess the inability to grow a tolerance.  The D was one, and this did not lose that trait, which makes it one that all ot...”
“such a good head high !”

“Best C-4 in town - just out of the hospital my knowledgeable bud tender at Have a Heart CC in Seattle, recommended next to a few grams. An avid mmj patient four bong hits and cannot wait to vape into dreamland. The relief I received helped me to relax enough to force me to keep checking to see if my mouth and gums were still attached to my jaw bone. Thank you to the friendly staff and I think C-4 is the best secret t...”
“If you like crystals this is for you.”

“ChemDawg 4 has a euphoric head buzz that seeps down your shoulders and through your spine giving you an uplifting daytime pain relief. If you need a great strain for a hike or you are trying to take the edge off the pain this is a great strain.”

“Well I must say....this  chemdawg 4 is quite impressive,first hit offers you a lemon but citrus taste,hits you immediately with a head sensation leaves you feeling happy and very uplifted,then the next 30 mins the indica side come out in a surprising!! Way,this strain offers the best of both worlds...”

“The smoke is pretty smooth, somewhere between GSK and Blue Dream.  The effects aren't incapacitating, and last up to two hours.  It's great for mood elevation, doesn't impair activities, and I can still multitask.  The munchies are not immediate but strong.”

“very euphoric and uplifting high. kind of trippy the mind can race back and forth from time to time.   definitely not a couch lock feel but not super energetic either. it has a nice balance between the two.”
“Dense but breaks down great but burns faster than the normal dense bud.”
“smooth intake, with a bit of a tart flavor on the exhale.”
“high thc makes this my fave.”
“This strain is very powerful and provides a nice body buzz, and chills you out immediately!”

“This was my very first concentrate that I'd tried, in a vape pen.  OMG!  So wonderful.  It gives me a bit of a rush, immediately, and then a much bigger one a few minutes later, which lasts.  I have arthritis hands, knees and ankles, and this makes me feel loads better.”
“head high right out of the gates, a bit heavier of a smoke, but the head high got me ready for bed...or a Netflix marathon. Definitely a good night time high with muld cerebral effects.”
“By far one of my favorite strains! Top three for sure.”
“Very relaxing smoke. Helped me fall asleep after a long day.”
“One of my favorite flowers! A good pain reliever”
“Top shelf strain, I'd say. It makes you super relaxed yet it still has a head high. It's just really chilling and calming. Definitely an Indica for the Indica guy.”
“extremely powerful bud”
“really stoney not for a light high i dab this when i want to shut off from reality.”
“Laid Back, not too heady-high. Body high is powerful and calming. Very helpful for my anxiety and blood pressure. A good strain to smoke and make music or be creative with.”
“Chem 4 had this cerebral feel that can keep you up and relaxed without the sedative effects also the taste had this piney earthy taste..”
“it wasn't as heavy hitting as i was hoping for, but it was tasty and did the job.”
“yeo ii have sum chemdaug , shits fire fire .. fall river , Ma ..”

“This is a great Indica for me in the sense that it does not posses much on the cerebral side of things, which is great for unwinding at the end of the day and alleviating one of worries. In concentrate form, it yields a smoke as smooth as it is potent with an immediate body whallop indeed. Also appreciated is the pungent chem aroma that accompanies deep, warm, sandalwood.”
“nice strain for relaxation,stress,pain. the taste was smooth going down, alittle harsh coming out. over all thid was a good strain for me.”

“Flat out amazing strain. 
That flavor of piney citrus sour funk is almost unmatchable. one of my favorite tasting strains in the world. It definitely has a more indica high than the 91 chem. Very dense and uniform structure with light green buds and short straight orange hairs. Very potent smoke, sends you soaring straight up and leaves you there for a good long while, which leads to a nice, borderline narcotic body ...”
“This is hands down the most amazing buzz  i have encountered in a hybrid and fuck I am stoned to begeesus ?!?! Wow highly highly recommend!!:)”
“Really great stuff. I was very relaxed and happy. All of the good traits from chemdog and none of the bad. I highly recommend it.”
“Omg.. it's to die for.. keeps yo u calm & with energy. Never tried it before, until I moved here & was introduce to Chemdawg4. I would suggest it to anybody to try.”
“a jizzy j of this got me lit 💡”

“One day I was at the dispensary, saw this and broke down and bought an eighth to try it out. It's very true that this is a dominant indica strain but it has a nice sativa start. For me, I consider this to be one of the few strains that can still put me on my ass, halfway passed out on my couch. I noticed a slight creep overtime too, which can knock off your judgement if you're not careful. It tasted like artificial p...”
“this weed made me high as hell”

“A great hybrid. The first hour or so is smooth and uplifting. Not too elevated in the head and it's a little floaty in the body high. The later end of the stone brings you down a notch and relaxes you even further. This is a nice strain for a nice mellow afternoon.”
“as live resin 👏🏼👏🏼👏🏼⭐️⭐️⭐️”
“Extremely strong bud. One on my new fav's. Although, not recommended for beginners, this WILL put you on your ass!”
“this was very sticky and sweet, a good choice for nighttime”
“excellent for me for nighttime, pungent and tasty, very good choice”
“Amazing. The way marijuana should be. Aggressive to the nostrils and throat. Gets the job done which is the whole purpose. All these exotic strains out these days... I'll stick with Chem...”
“Strong pungent pine smell, immediate head high. Sativa dominant . Love it !!! Odiforous”
“Fantastic head/body high. I was fortunate to get some with 28.99% THC. A little goes a long way for sure.  :)”

“Update for me, this is a extremely potent strain.  Supposedly mine was 28% and I  believe it.  Last night it dropped me to the ground.  Literally,  I had to  lay down for a while.  I was reluctant to give 5 stars previously, because it isn't a beautiful flower IMO.  But that's irrelevant with how fantastic this strain medicinally and all around.”

“This strain did not work for me. It was wayyyy cerebral! My boyfriend & I both individually each get through about 1/8 every two weeks. We both had the same reaction - we felt like our bodies were jerking at every movement, whether it was walking, moving our arms, etc. I felt like I had parkinson's just trying to push the pedestrian button to cross the street & became super paranoid because of it. I did end up finish...”

“You have to do it justice with C4:
Get a high quality 4g" Eighth

column1: Smoke a good sized bowl (or 2 mini bowls) and you are set for 2 hours of bliss and pain free relaxation. With a good grinder
If you want to make sure it gives you a great high
column2: then use a vaporizer. I have a simple box vaporizer and if i use that
column3: that eighth could last me for 12+ days.  The better vaporizer is what makes ...”"
“Incredible. Chemdawg #1 is preferred to #4 for me because #1 is Sativa dominant.”
“Potent and relaxing.”

“So Happy I ran into some of this. Tastes great. The initial buzz is one of the all-time best ever. Swear to God. Thank you Chemdog. Thank you God Jesus.  This is awesome! 

 EUPHORIA and HAPPY and FEEL GOOD

 Can get intense, in a good way.”
“top 5 its one of the best out there. it should be in every dispensary.”
“You will be wrapped in a blanket of calm. Great to use before dinner or when watching a movie.”

“Probably my favorite of the chems that i've personally tried. It definitely had that funky quality when u crack it. Pungent and pretty loud, mostly earthy with notes of typical citrus sweetness. Burned smooth and expanded like crazy, the good kinda cough. Effects were mostly cerebral but also had a pretty heavy body load, with a good amount of dry mouth.”
“One of my favourites”
“Good bud very relaxing focus”

“Best ive had yet.
Takes effect within minutes”

“Writing review as I test.  Very enjoyable smell, akin to citrus.  Smell is strong as well.  The flavor is similar to the scent in terms of being citrus-esque and enjoyable, but different in that the smoke was light - complementing the flavor.  The experience hits you like a freight train made of pillows - the moment you inhale you are greeted with a mellow, relaxing, euphoric feeling.  The head high is strong but ver...”
“Cool relaxing or active high”
“From K-Dog, decent. smoked it after 6 month cold streak and wasn't on my ass so not too powerful but extremely relaxing, and nice Indica feel to it. Great smelling great look and taste. Good High”
“This flower gave a great high and good feeling”
“Amazing strain, one of my favorite Hybrids!”

“Chemdawg 4 is quality bud. Appears lightish green with long orange hairs and plentiful coating 

Tastes like straight pine-sol and chemicals.  However, be warned , Chemdawg 4 is different from other Chemdawgs because its definetly more indica than sativa.”
“really high in THC, very plesant taste.  It's got the expansion factor in my lungs.  A new favorite!”
“bout to try it now. after reading reviews...I'm excited. lol.”
“I smoked this strain for the first time this weekend and it's the best hybrid I've ever blazed. When u find this strain get all u can💨💨💨💨💨💨💨💨💨💨💨💨”

“4SD chem 4 x sour diesel cross that I picked up in AZ.Was FIRE tested @ 27.5% I took very little achieve desired effect's.AZ holding shiptz down nice to see strain testing at that ratio.
I picked up a 1/2 ounce was very good>clear head alertness and budz were tighly compact.Hashishans 5mg 1:1 on deck even alertness.Smell of clean pine/deisel/lemon zest.Desired effect with slight cerebral was achieved.Flavor's of even...”
“Its once of the best strains that really gots it all smell ,looks and gets u medicated throughout the day.”
“EEWt”
“From Nature's Relief. Like a 1/2 hit of acid.”
“Smoked this shit and just got blown away. We packed a good amount of bowls..straight fire. Has a good taste and smell to it, isn't harsh at all.”
“Knock out weed! Love it takes me away!!”
“Blocks pain but has a chemical taste to it.”
“very relaxing for bipolar”
“OMG.  I have seizures, severe insomnia AND depression..................................GONE, GONE, GONE!!!!.  This shit takes care of EVERYTHING!!!!!  I'm not kidding kids :)”
“Makes me relaxed, yet pleasantly aware and functional. I only vape, so I'm not sure if smoking would produce other effects. Good late-afternoon weed.”

“This strain is great by itself, or crossed with others.

My #1”

“Beautiful strain, i was fortunate enough to try it hydroponically grown. The description is true it will Have you nice and relaxed and feeli couch locked. Do not smoke in the AM if your planning on doing something that requires attention. Also im not a chemdawg fan but wow awesome Strain”
“I have had the regular Chem but decided to try this out. absolutely dank. strong smell with a good head high. loved it and would strongly recommend”
“Great for reducing pain while making me relaxed and lazy”
“Totally mellow high. You'll have no problem properly functioning after smoking this strain.”

“I usually don't smoke indicas as they don't sit well with my brain and are likely to make me green out. Having said that, I actually quite enjoyed this strain. The initial high was pretty intense yet mellow. As I came down, I grew increasingly more tired and eventually fell asleep on the couch. Would definitely smoke this again!”
“Amazing indica that has you feeling relaxed but awake. After some time the tiredness overcomes you. Dank and Sweet smelling.”
“Nice nice trees. About 15 min to take affect.  Wonderful out of my pax handheld vape. Taste of earthy Betty's and sweet trees. Eyes gotten heavy very cerebral. Love the body high of this tree.”
“Pretty good head effects, made everything funny. Great smell, has a unique smell for sure.”
“I really like being this kind of stoned. Everything feels great and I can dance like Justin Timberlake. And not that N'Sync bullshit. The real JT.”

“one of the best strains I've smoked in my 7 years of weed endeavors.

heavy body high ..numbing”
“best all around strain (.)”
“love it!”

“I'm still new to canna-society, but hands down this was the best, euphoric, enlightened high I've had from all the strains I've tried to date. Very relaxed with a nice light, clear-head. Lasted for several hours from 2 bongs hits (less than full bowl). I will be getting more of this wonderful strain. The smell and taste are easy to injest.”
“This strain is really great but it makes me feel a little too paranoid”
“I picked up some FIRE Chem 4 solventless at the co-op a few days ago, and I had to post the picture i took of it on here.”

“Asked for a happy, giggle laugh your ass off strain. This is what I was told would serve this. I should have had this app before! Totally fell into a deep sleep. My partner was looking for a happy pain reliever-didn't comfort him in the least. I am almost ready to dump all of it. Won't buy again. Hated the taste too. Reminded me of a wet nasty forest taste”
“it's green”
“Did not try this”
